table.name: vtiger_threats
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_threats` ( `threatsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `threatsname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `accounts` int(10) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`threatsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_threatscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_threatscf` ( `threatsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`threatsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
